Convert 1Gig links to 10Gig - Power8 VIOS - taprvio100-101-110-111-130-131

taprvio100/101

taprvio100

  1. Check the current status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep ^"Physical Port Speed"
  2. Put the SEA on standby
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=standby
  3. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in pgsnap01 qgsnap01 saerdb01 pgscdb01 pocafasv03
do
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   if [ ${?} -ne 0 ]
   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   fi
done
  4. Ask network team to make changes
    FEX109 - Port 3 
FEX109 - Port 4
  5. Check the current Speed and aggregation status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep -e^"Physical Port Speed" -e ^"Aggregation status:"
  6. Change SEA mode back to shared
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=sharing
  7. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in pgsnap01 qgsnap01 saerdb01 pgscdb01 pocafasv03
do
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   if [ ${?} -ne 0 ]
   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   else
      ssh ${host} ls -ld /tmp      
   fi
done
  8. Take a 30 minutes break

taprvio101

  1. Check the current status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep ^"Physical Port Speed"
  2. Put the SEA on standby
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=standby
  3. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in pgsnap01 qgsnap01 saerdb01 pgscdb01 pocafasv03

   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   fi
done
  4. Ask network team to make changes
    FEX110 - Port 3 
FEX110 - Port 4
  5. Check the current Speed and aggregation status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep -e^"Physical Port Speed" -e ^"Aggregation status:"
  6. Change SEA mode back to shared

taprvio110/111

taprvio110

  1. Check the current status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep ^"Physical Port Speed"
  2. Put the SEA on standby
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=standby
  3. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in peerap98 tnqa3d01 pgdmr055 pgsnap02 qaap3p01 tgdvetl1 dgbcdb01 qgbcdb01
do
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   if [ ${?} -ne 0 ]
   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   else
      ssh ${host} ls -ld /tmp      
   fi
done
  4. Ask network team to make changes
    FEX109 - Port 5 
FEX109 - Port 6
  5. Check the current Speed and aggregation status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep -e^"Physical Port Speed" -e ^"Aggregation status:"
  6. Change SEA mode back to shared
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=sharing
  7. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in peerap98 tnqa3d01 pgdmr055 pgsnap02 qaap3p01 tgdvetl1 dgbcdb01 qgbcdb01
do
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   if [ ${?} -ne 0 ]
   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   else
      ssh ${host} ls -ld /tmp      
   fi
done
  1. Take a 30 minutes break

taprvio130/131

taprvio130

  1. Check the current status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep ^"Physical Port Speed"
  2. Put the SEA on standby
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=standby
  3. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in taitc103 xsggwdb1 pgasdb01 pgjbdb01 tgpretl1 tedv2d03 pocafasv04 pafoap01 pgbcdb99
do
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   if [ ${?} -ne 0 ]
   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   else
      ssh ${host} ls -ld /tmp      
   fi
done
  4. Ask network team to make changes
    FEX109 - Port 25 
FEX109 - Port 26
  5. Check the current Speed and aggregation status
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep -e^"Physical Port Speed" -e ^"Aggregation status:"
  6. Change SEA mode back to shared
    sudo chdev -l ent6 -a ha_mode=sharing
  7. Check pings to hosts from pgnmsv01
    for host in taitc103 xsggwdb1 pgasdb01 pgjbdb01 tgpretl1 tedv2d03 pocafasv04 pafoap01 pgbcdb99
do
   ping -c1 ${host} > /dev/null 2>&1
   if [ ${?} -ne 0 ]
   then
      echo "Problem with ${host} "
   else
      ssh ${host} ls -ld /tmp      
   fi
done
  1. Take a 30 minutes break
